page.title: 06HOUSING IN GOLDERS GREEN
page.content: The area around Golders Green is very {residential.}The houses vary greatly. At the smaller end are the houses on the North End Road. The houses are only 5m wide but have 3 floors. They were{built for the Underground Engin- {eers.}The houses have been there for about 110 years. They have large gardens which are about 40m long and 5m wide. One of the{larger houses}is in{Well- {garth Road.}The house we looked at was about 50 years old and 25m wide. It has a very large back garden and two small front gardens. In the area there are also flats, bed and breakfasts and small hotels, especially along North End Road. The larger houses are divided into flats and many of the properties are rented by{temporary visitors}from other countries.
